resources.string: Foodie™ is a food delivery service that does Home Deliveries to it\'s customers, from over 20000 restaurants / outlets all over India.We are one of INDIA\'s premier Home Delivery Service.Operational since 1998, we have served over 7,50,000 people so far.
What locations does Foodie service, at the moment?
Currently, Foodie is servicing its customers all over India.Soon, you will see us expand our service coverage ABROAD, as well.
Can I order from 2 or more restaurants at the same time?
No, You can only order from one restaurant at a time. However, after one order is placed, you can always go for an other one.
Why do you charge delivery charges?

Each restaurant gives us a small percentage of the order amount. But for small orders we cannot afford to deliver within the commission we receive. Instead of declining such orders, we give you the option of delivering it to you, if you are prepared to pay the delivery charges.
Are the prices listed on this app accurate and binding?

We make every effort to keep the prices updated and accurate. Prices listed on this website are however approximate and subject to changes by the Restaurant and Taxes.The final price is as per the ACTUAL BILL raised by the Restaurant and presented to you, at the time of the delivery.
Can I get discounts for big orders?

Sorry, as a practice we do not give discounts as we work on very slim margins, already.But, we could check with the Restaurant - and IF they offer any special discount, we\'d be happy to pass it on to you!
How much time does it take to deliver the order?
Generally it takes between 45 minutes to 1 hour time to deliver the order. Due to long distance or heavy traffic, delivery might take few extra minutes.
How do I know my order has gone through?
You will see an \'Order Placed\' dialog box and also receive a Notification.
Enter your Registered mobile number and email below:
You Don\'t have any Favourite Restaurants.
You Don\'t Have any Orders Yet
